info.title: Expense Tracker API
info.description: Ttack your daily expense with this amazing app.

scopes.basic:
to read any and all data related to a user (e.g. following/followed-by
 lists, photos, etc.) (granted by default)

post.description: User and administrator log into the system.

302.description:
There could be two situations:

(1) If username and password don't match, login failed, redirect to login page.

(2) Usernmae and password match, login success.  Store user's information into session. Return user information to front end, and front end redirect to '/#/admin' or '/#/user' based on the user's role.
Logout success, session is cleared, and window redirect to login page.

parameters.name: receipt
parameters.description: New receipt that is going to be stored into database.

get.description: User browse all receipts. If no query is provided, system will return the first page with size 10 of user's all receipts. Else, system will return certain number of receipts according to query.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: Place where use got the receipt.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of a page of the respond body.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: This address would get an email, in which user can reset password.

post.description: User can share receipts with others in the system, but other people can only read them.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: Email address of the user to share with.

post.description: User create a new project by naming it.

put.description: User edit a project by changing it's name, and corresponding receipts.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project object with new name and new list of receipts.

get.summary: Admin view users and search for users.
get.description: Admin can search users by their name, email and role.Everytime an admin wants to search user by name, role and phone, a GET request would be generated to the back-end. But when an admin wants to see the full information of a user, including both his profile and receipts, a GET request with userID as the query parameter would be generated.

parameters.name: isAdmin
parameters.description: If admin want to search for all admins, "isAdmin" is true, or it's false.

post.description: Admin will fill in user's email, username, name, phone number and role. Then the system would generate an email to user's eamil address and prompt for confirmation.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: ID of user to be edited.

parameters.name: formData
parameters.description: form data with name, list of phone numbers, and isAdmin in it.

200.description: User's profile will be changed, the response is an user object.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: ID of user to be edited.

parameters.name: isAdmin
parameters.description: Set user to be admin if "isAdmin" is true, else set user to be user. The reponse is a user object.

200.description: User's profile will be changed, the response is a user object.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: ID of user to be edited.

200.description: User's status will be changed to "enabled". The response is a user object.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: ID of user to be edited.

200.description: User's status will be changed to "enabled". The response is a user object.

username.description: Username is used to login, it would be displayed on the top right conor, and every username is unique in the system.

isAdmin.description: If user is admin, this property is true, or it's false.

first.description: If current page is the first page, this property is true.

last.description: If current page is the last page, this property is true.

numberOfElements.description: Number of elements in current page.

totalElements.description: Number of elements in all pages.

project.description: Project that the receipt is associated with.
